com.rohitsood.urlybird.client.gui.widget.menu.item
Class ModeMenuItem

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JMenuItem
                      com.rohitsood.urlybird.client.gui.widget.menu.item.ModeMenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.MenuElement, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class ModeMenuItem
extends javax.swing.JMenuItem

The mode menu item triggers a call to toggle the mode of the application from offline to online and vice versa. The call gets delegated to the manager.

Version:
1.1.
Author:
Rohit Sood
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

init

private void init()
Initialize the manger record menu item. Adds an ActionListener.

isOnline

public boolean isOnline()
Getter for the mode status. Values determine if the client is connected to a local database or a remote server.

Returns:
If true then the client in online.

setOnline

public void setOnline(boolean online)
Sets the mode status for the application. This results in a change of text.

Parameters:
online - The mode to set the item listener at.
